Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps19.view.connection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RMIReaderIntf
    Remote interface to create the method of the reader to be remotely called
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection
    Abstract class that covers communication with one user
    ConnectionLogger
    Class to reference a logger about connection
    RMIConnection
    Class for RMI connection
    RMIReader
    Class that implements a reader in a RMI interface
    RMIWriter
    Class that implements a writer in a RMI interface
    SocketConnection
    Class for socket connection
    SocketReader
    Implements Reader for Socket Communication
    SocketWriter
    Implements Writer for Socket Communication
    Writer
    Abstract class to write a message.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ConnectionStatus
    Enum with possible connection statuses
